name: Miscreation: Evolve Your Creature!
storyline:
Evolve your creature to survive Yggdrasil! You are a newborn blob at the base of the great tree. You must climb to prove your worth, under the eyes of the goddesses. Collect parts of other animals, combining them in your own body to become the optimal creature! 
 
Miscreation is a game about customizing a creature. Start as a small, defenseless blob. Grow legs, arms, a tail, a new head, wings and some big, nasty teeth - become your enemy's nightmare or a cute, cuddly creature. Thousands of possible combinations!
summary: Evolve your creature to survive Yggsdrasil! You are a newborn blob at the base of the divine tree. Collect legs, arms, tails, wings and other parts, then combine them in your own body to become the optimal creature!
